column1: Little Goat Diner////I had off on a Summer Friday and thought this would be the perfect place to go to skip a wait. We get there right around lunch time and as we requested an outdoor table only had to wait a few minutes. This gave us time to go to the bar and order a drink and right when we got the drink our table was ready. When we got to try our Bloody Mary
column2: it was surprisingly strong and flavorful
column3: so you certainly get the bang for your buck!
